H0.text: list of local government area in benue state. Makurdi

H1.text: list of local government area in benue state. Gboko

H2.text: list of local government area in benue state. Katsina-Ala

H3.text: list of local government area in benue state. Oju

A4.text: The second group comprises towns with a population of between 20,000 and 50,000 people and includes Katsina-Ala, Zaki-Biam, Vandeikya and Adikpo. These are all local government headquarters.

A5.text: Gboko, Otukpo and Oju double as the local government and ethnic headquarters (i.e. for Tiv, Idoma, and Igede).

A6.text: The rise of Alhaji Al-Hassan Maikeke as the chairman of Makurdi Local Government Council in 1998

A7.text: Gboko is a Local Government Area in Benue state, North-central Nigeria.

A8.text: Katsina-Ala is a Local Government Area (LGA) of Benue State, Nigeria.

A9.text: The LGA of Katsina-Ala has an area of 2,402 km2 (927 sq mi) and a population of 224,718 at the 2006 census.
